input.sentences: i was so grateful for my sister allowing me to move in with her after my divorce .
i started to eat a bit more healthier | and these seeds are part of my journey .
i cut out bread | and just ate meant amd vegetables .
my sister wants me to help her with a healthy lifestyle as well .
she is a sweet person | and deserves all the happiness .
output.sentences: My sister was grateful that I helped her move.
We started her journey by finding seed spilled on the sofa.
That meant it was time to cut some vegetables.
My sister maintains a healthy lifestyle.
She is a sweet person and I wish her happiness.
